title: Silver Trap
description:
Description :
        A special unit of soldiers and mercenaries with monstrous physical abilities. Despite his pretty face Alyan has a sharp-tongue and also has a crush on his Sargent Dan, who looks out for him. One day while Alyan was passing by the government office, he finds Dan being disciplined by his lieutenant commander, a lieutenant commander known for his bullying tactics. Alyan goes and fetches some ointment to help treat Dan's injuries but instead finds Dan being excited by the pain...
